/** * Supported types of names. Unless you are matching particular family names, use {@link #GENERIC}. The * GENERIC NameType should work reasonably well for non-name words. The other encodings are * specifically tuned to family names, and may not work well at all for general text. * * @since 1.6 * @version $Id: NameType.java 1429868 2013-01-07 16:08:05Z ggregory $ */
